Reviews.Title: “Good location, simple hotel.”
Reviews.Author: Marina v Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: location easy minutes walk dam square tram station easy amsterdam gentleman welcomed friendly simple clean shower toilet hallway clean staying nicer amount money amsterdam

Reviews.Title: “two days at the Aspen”
Reviews.Author: james h Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: clean hotel located center easy walk main station ownermanager friendly guy answered questions 8 hotel 4 floor bathroomshower accessthe stairs narrow steep drunk otherwise compromised mentally ascending descending stairs basically enjoyed stay price return amsterdam prices

Reviews.Title: “Spartan, but in a good location”
Reviews.Author: Satchel2010
Reviews.Content: ascend charming steep winding staircase check floor floor innkeepers nice hotel location walking distance train station close anne frank house people dont expect usual amenities shampoo fans tv ice buckets youll fine terrific stay clean safe sleep location definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Poor quality budget”
Reviews.Author: LondonPaul
Reviews.Content: love budget hotels amsterdam tried plenty reluctant disappointed clean warm convenient dam square am pretty price little extra breakfast shared shower seen literally 5 inches clothes towel wet scalded frozen spray entirely characterless budget hotel doesnt try reception held someones bedroomliving isnt tv kettle curtains light main drag rumbling trams complimentary soap smells plastic cup toothbrush agree seen budget hotel awful advice shop willing pay little extra extras budget hotels city 24 hour reception breakfasts friendly funky staff previous reviews details oh enjoy amsterdam amazing chooses budget amsterdam prepared steepest stairs pretty unavoidable

Reviews.Title: “The worst ever”
Reviews.Author: Alvinerius
Reviews.Content: ive stayed entire life hard fit suitcase spots carpet didnt clean hotel expected reading comments shared bathroom ridiculous theres space bath dress undress yourself shower wearing jeans wet dress check 10 oclock sharp guests coming owner extremely rude leave hotel terrible experience

Reviews.Title: “Great Budget Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Johnas77
Reviews.Content: firstly reviews moaning frills hotel expect money youre paying hotel advertised budget basic hotel delivers exactly promises stayed twice friends times amsterdam marathon hotel brilliantly located supermarket block 5 minute walk dam sq true stairs suitable elderly frail travellers travel substantial luggage mentioned blogs hotel reviews friendly smiling welcomes home city family run business feel hotel aspen real value money expensive city

Reviews.Title: “Simple, very inexpensive, good location”
Reviews.Author: jrissman
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel aspen friends june 2011 chose city center inexpensive upsides clean reasonably staff friendly inexpensive central location close red light district downsides strongly smelled marijuana smoke left window day smell gone staircases steep carry bags flights stairs careful climbing flight hit head hard ceiling staircase

Reviews.Title: “Clean and well located, good budget hotel in a great location.”
Reviews.Author: pepipox
Reviews.Content: nice nofrills hotel located middle amsterdam hotel clean maintained clean condition owner helpful hotel located center amsterdam blocks dam corner anna franks house recommend nice budget hotel location careful steep staircase lift problematic

Reviews.Title: “Very clean budget hotel in a great location”
Reviews.Author: SaltaireClaire
Reviews.Content: hotel perfect budget weekend stairs extremely steep dont luggage fairly mobile manageable stayed triple spacious spartan clean quiet perfect location 15 mins walk central station convenient

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic location!”
Reviews.Author: Jodi_Shaun
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel aspen nights stayed 5 double top floor perfect considering sleeping toilet shower hallway clean basin free wifi lot stairs climb yes steep traditional amsterdam building getting top location fantastic heart city walking distance tram stop nearby

Reviews.Title: “Nice room, great location”
Reviews.Author: Satans7thBride
Reviews.Content: loved staying location perfect short walk dam square delicious pancake house amazing view hotel extremely helpful friendly comfortable single beds desk chairs bathroom actually pretty decent size complaints downside steep neverending stairs apart stay

Reviews.Title: “A great hotel with a murderous staircase”
Reviews.Author: ampett
Reviews.Content: enjoyed stay hotel aspen folks reception nice available hours day top floor wonderful wake watch bicycle traffic windows dont block sound night hard fall asleep werent exhausted sightseeing clean wellmaintained beds relatively soft staircase vertical climb time reached third floor ready drop staff offering help bags proprietor friendly

Reviews.Title: “Perfect for people who will only use it for sleep!”
Reviews.Author: kallirache
Reviews.Content: husband amsterdam april short break thanks volcano booked close compared ensuit wasnt expensive located 3 mins dam square tram stop outside door 20 meters west kerk walking distance minus hotel stairs fair lot hotels steep lot luggage mission owner helpful bags help surprised woman travel bag top floor obviously worth coz awsome view wasnt loud hotel main road minimal clean crisp white sheets fluffy pillows extra blankets wardrobe bathroom shower fresh towels daily extremely cozy werent stay found exactly looking mean money paid worse fine experience hotels amsterdam stay 3 ones flights cancelled expensive difference tv bathtub instead shower aspen hotel students people sleep sometimes oh free wifi
